name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add "Mark All Read" button to GMail

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to mark all messages as read with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The button allows you to change every visible message with an "unread" status to "read" status.
